mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, noticeno, noticetitle, noticedate from (select * from notice order by noticedate desc, noticeno desc)) where rnum >= 1 and rnum <= 3
select * from notice order by noticeno desc
select * from notice where noticetitle like '%' || #{ keyword } || '%' order by noticeno desc
select * from notice where noticewriter like '%' || #{ keyword } || '%' order by noticeno desc
select * from notice where noticeno = #{ noticeno }
mapper.delete: delete from notice where noticeno = #{ noticeno }
mapper.insert: insert into notice(noticeno, noticetitle, noticewriter, noticedate, original_filepath, rename_filepath, noticecontent) values ((select max(noticeno) + 1 from notice), #{ noticetitle }, #{ noticewriter }, sysdate, #{ original_filepath, jdbcType=VARCHAR }, #{ rename_filepath, jdbcType=VARCHAR }, #{ noticecontent })
